record.description: "Sing a song of college days, tell me where to go," and here the words might be changed to "Chicago for her pretty girls." These fourteen co-eds at the University of Chicago are entered in the annual Cap and Gown beauty contest which closes Tuesday. Fredric March, movie star and University of Wisconsin alumnus, will pick the winner from the finalists submitted to him. Left to right: Mary Haskell, junior and Quadrangle member; Mary Jane Stephanson, junior and Sigma member; Fairday Benedict, freshman and Mortar Board member; Betty Booth, sophomore and Sigma member; Mary Adele Crosby, freshman; Anita Homs, freshman; Bonita Lillie, junior and Quadrangle member; Jean Gayton, freshman and Quadrangle member; Peg Tillinghast, sophomore and Mortar Board member; Bonnie Breternitz, sophomore and Quadrangle member; Leslie Wilson, sophomore and Esoteric member; Echo Guiou, freshman and Mortar Board member; Peg Callanan, junior and Chi Rho Sigma member; and Betty Dale Cooke, senior and Sigma member.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Oversize image, two separate image files merged in Photoshop.
